sentences.sentence: We met at a bar called the Flamingo.
sentences.translation: 我们在一家名为“火烈鸟”的酒吧相遇。

sentences.sentence: A flamingo can sleep while standing on one leg.
sentences.translation: 火烈鸟可以单腿站立睡觉。

sentences.sentence: I say, John, I see your flamingo with the broken leg!
sentences.translation: 喂，约翰，我看见你的断腿火烈鸟了！
